title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Linking Teachers' Personality Traits to Learning Outcomes in Mathematics Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Over 3 years of mathematics education experience, foundational instructional design, and understanding of personality types
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze three or more optimal combinations of teacher-learner interactions using MBTI or Big5 personality trait theories.
Learners can design two or more personalized feedback strategies based on personality traits for mathematics curricula.
Learners can apply learning motivation techniques according to personality types for large-scale online learners.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
